“I see the woman you are referring to is my daughter Hinata. She is currently seeing someone unfortunately,” he answered. He spoke the truth she is currently dating the son of the Inuzuka clan head Kiba. He didn’t approve of the boys personality though. To Hiashi the boy was to brash and head strong. He also suspected that the boy will one day cheat on Hinata but had no proof at the moment.

With those thoughts in mind he looked at the somewhat saddened look on the boy in front of him. While from what Hiashi had heard was also headstrong but was willing to but his pride aside for the betterment of his people. Something he didn’t think the Inuzuka would do. He also had much better standing than the Inuzuka being the son of a Daimyo. If he had to choose he would choose the boy in front of him over the Inuzuka. Unfortunately his daughter was in love with him.

“I see,” Naruto said. He should have known a woman that beautiful was already taken. He was about to leave the room with Sasuke so they can talk about how they were going to spend their next few days when Hiashi stopped them.

“However I do not really approve of the boy she is seeing and am willing to work out a deal with you,” Hiashi said. He gestured for them to sit down again. When they did he continued. “I find the boys rash and arrogant behavior annoying and is not worthy of my daughter. The problem is that I had made a promise with my wife that I will let my daughter look for her own husband till she turned 18 and if she was not at least seeing anyone at that point I would be able to find a suitable husband. She turned eighteen three months ago and had already started to see an Inuzuka Kiba. If she were to break up with him or something were to happen to him I would be able to arrange my daughter with someone worthy of her. Someone like yourself.”

Naruto looked at the man for a few moments and said, “To make sure I understand you want me to arrange for your daughter to find a reason to break up with him or him to break up with her or to arrange for his death.” He was shocked to hear the man say this and wasn’t sure how to respond.

Sasuke just sat there listening to the two talk. He could come up with a few ways to cause this to happen he just needed to know how it was to be done. He didn’t see a problem with this because it was not entirely unheard of in some noble families.

“That is correct. So will you help me with this,” Hiashi asked.

What does Naruto decide?
1553211112.title: Meeting the Hyuga head

15532111121.content: do they prove Kiba is a cheating scum bag or do they put the dog down
15532111121.title: okay lets do this

155321111212.content:
“Okay let’s do this,” Naruto said. He knew that this sometimes happens in noble families with his own being no different. When his mother had set her eyes on his father she was determined to get him even if she had to threaten him with life imprisonment in the palace dungeon (which she did do). “Do you have a preference over how it is done?”

“I have tried to find evidence of him cheating on her. I have found some but she won’t believe it unless she sees it with her own two eyes. I would rather save my daughter from that type of pain and I want the dog gone for treating my daughter the way he does,” Hiashi answered. “But the main thing is that Hinata cannot know about this. She would try to warn Kiba or would try to fight against future arrangements we may make.”

Naruto nods his head at this and looks at Sasuke. “So Sasuke any ideas,” he asked.

“I have a few,” he answered. “It would be best if we waited a few days before we did anything. If something happens to him today or tomorrow it will seem suspicious we suddenly met when it happens.”

“We could work around that easily enough by having us discuss somethings like new seals to defend their compound and a few other things that the hyuga have been trying to convince us to do for a while,” Naruto answered. In truth the Uzumaki clan had a good client in the Hyuga’s a while back that got broken when the Hyuga’s altered the bloodline protection seal they acquired from the Uzumaki with the cage bird seal.

Hiashi nods his head in agreement. “That is true and I may be able to convince the elders to use the original seal again if we can come to an agreement and able to get other seals for our clan. It would also be a good argument for Hinata since she dislikes the cage bird seal,” Hiashi said.

“Well if that is the case then do you know where he is right know,” Sasuke asked. If they didn’t have to worry about suspicion than he wanted to get this over with. If needed he would go himself to take care of the Inuzuka.

“Yes he was recently hired to track down a bandit camp that has appeared in the country side,” Hiashi answered.

“Well that could be useful bandits sometimes have missing ninja in their ranks,” Naruto answered. “I think it might be best if you leave the rest to me and Sasuke so you have plausible deniability.” Hiashi nods his head at this and the three discuss possible seals the Hyuga’s could purchase. When they were done Naruto and Sasuke left the compound to come up with a plan for the dog.

In Hiashi’s office the elders walked in. “Hiashi what was that the Uzumaki wanted to discuss,” Hiashi’s father asked. He was hoping that the Uzumaki would accept them as client again.

“We talked about a few things and they are willing to take us on as clients again if we change the cage bird seal back to the bloodline protection seal. Also it seems that my daughters beauty convinced them to help us with our little dog problem,” Hiashi answered using coded speech for them to understand the hidden agreement.

“I see that is a good thing,” the elder said. The phrase was easy enough to decipher. The elder could not deny how beautiful Hiashi’s eldest is. Hearing that the young Uzumaki had fallen for it and would get rid of the annoying Inuzuka for them made things easier. They were already making plans to eliminate the boy but if the Uzumaki does it then their hands will remain clean. As an added bonus they will get strong ties with the royalty of whirlpool country. They talk to Hiashi about a few other things before they to leave as well. Leaving Hiashi to work on the clan paper work.

Meanwhile Naruto and Sasuke were discussing what to do about a stray dog while walking around the capital. Well their clones were. The two had created a shadow clone each in an alley way near the Hyuga compound the real two were tracking down the Inuzuka that had decided to take this mission solo thinking that the bandits couldn’t even touch them.

What next?
155321111212.title: making the plan

1553211112121.content:
It took two days but Kiba had finally managed to find the bandit camp. He was surveying the camp to find the best place to attack with his dog Akamaru. They were debating on if they should take on a camp this size by themselves or call in back up. Kiba felt they could do it on their own while Akamaru wanted to call for back up.

“C’mon buddy we can take these chumps. I know that there are a lot more than expected but there is not one that is trained to use chakra,” Kiba said to his partner. The dog responded with a few wines and barks. “Tell you what buddy we do this and I will get you a nice large steak afterwards deal.” This caused the nervous dog to nod its head in acceptance.

In another tree farther away Sasuke and Naruto were sitting in it watching the display with Kiba and Akamaru. Sasuke was using his sharigan to read Kiba’s lips. “I think we will be doing the world a favor by killing him know when he is alone than wait for him to kill himself and his team thanks to his arrogance,” Sasuke said, he had seen the whole debate and could not believe how stupid this guy was. There was over a hundred bandits in this camp and even he or Naruto would be hesitant to attack this camp in a frontal assault by themselves. If it was him he would wait till night and plant a few explosive tags at key points and set them off. He would probably kill a quarter to half of the bandits and use the confusion to kill the rest.

Naruto could not help but agree with Sasuke’s statement from what he said about what he was saying. Attacking this camp with a frontal assault during the day time is just stupid. If it was him he would wait for night time and create a bunch of shadow clones to surround the camp and attack it on all sides while he stood back and observed to take care of any survivors. “So want to take a bet we won’t have to do anything and he will get himself killed,” Naruto said.

“No while he may be stupid he at least has some power to defend himself. He will be exhausted and probably loose a quarter of the bandits when they run but he won’t get killed,” Sasuke answered. Naruto just nodded his head as they saw him and the dog get ready to attack. “Beside the dog is the brains and will save his ass before he dies.” This cause the two of them to laugh.

“Well there he goes,” Naruto said. He saw Kiba jump off the branch he was on and start attacking. “Remember wait till the right moment and take care of the dog I’ll handle Kiba.” The two watched as Kiba made short work of half of the bandits but could see that he and the dog were getting tired. They also saw that some of the bandits were starting to make a run for it. They saw that Kiba and the dog had split up to take care of a few more bandits. This is what they were waiting for.

Sasuke was positioning himself in a tree near the dog he had quickly ran to a few fallen bandits and grabbed one of their fallen swords. He then aimed the blade at one of the dog’s legs as it was getting ready to jump again. When it made the try he threw the sword and it went through the dogs knees causing it to howl in pain. This distracted it long enough for some of the archers in the group to hit the dog in several vital areas. The dog tried to fight a bit longer but eventually succumbed to its wounds and died.

Naruto watched as Kiba went into a rage seeing his partner get killed. He was now just attacking to attack. Seeing the opportunity he was waiting for he took two rocks he had in his hands and aimed for Kiba’s eyes. When they hit home Kiba yelled in pain and tried to wipe wise eyes to see again. Seeing him open three of the bandits attacked him stabbing him with their swords. He tried to fight them for a few more minutes taking two of them with him but he eventually died thanks to his wounds. Seeing that their job was done Naruto and Sasuke left the area leaving no trace that they were ever there. Two days later the body’s would be found by a patrol group and returned home for burial while the rest of the Inuzuka clan hunted down the remainder of the bandits to avenge their fallen comrade.


What next?
1553211112121.title: Kiba's death

15532111121212.content:
Naruto would spend two weeks negotiating the trade details with the fire Daimyo. During that two weeks he met with Hiashi a few times to arrange a marriage between him and Hinata. His mother fully approved of the marriage and was looking forward to meeting her. Hiashi has not told Hinata about the arrangements yet and letting her grieve for the loss of Kiba. They had even agreed to get rid of the cage bird seal and replace it with the original blood line protection seal.

It was the day before he was due to start his journey home that Hinata was told of the arrangement. She did not take it well. “Kiba has only been dead for two weeks and you already arranged for me to get married,” she yelled at the top of her lungs. “Well you can forget that I am not marrying him.”

“You will marry him Hinata. This marriage could help fix the rift between our clans and as a condition to the agreement the elders have agreed to remove the cage bird seal indefinably,” he told his daughter. He could not stop the smirk that appeared on his face when he saw her shocked expression. “Yes as a condition to the marriage we will no longer use the cage bird seal. So think about that before you turn down the marriage.”

Hinata wanted to keep screaming at him but she was too shocked to speak. While she was angry about the marriage she hated the cage bird seal even more and this was her chance to get rid of it. With great reluctance she said, “Fine.” She then turned around and stormed out of his office when she went to her room she found a few branch members packing up her things. “What is going on?”

They turned to her and looked at each other before one of them spoke, “well you see lady Hinata your father told us to pack your things for your trip tomorrow. He told us about the wedding congratulations.”

“What trip,” she asked.

Hiashi came up behind her and said, “Yes you left before I could tell you that you will be leaving for whirlpool tomorrow along with your future husband.”

“Why did you wait so long to tell me,” she asked.

“I wanted to give you time to mourn,” he answered.

Hinata was so angry at him right now that the only thing she could think about doing was leaving the compound and look for some of her friends. She first went to Kurenai’s place to talk to her. When she walked in she looked at her sensei and just started to cry for a few minutes. After that she told her sensei about the arranged marriage.

Kurenai was pissed. She could not believe Hiashi would do this only a few weeks after she lost a loved one. She wanted to march over to Hiashi and beat his brains in but she needed to help Hinata right now. The two talked for a few hours and both cried a little seeing as this will be the last they see of each other unless Kurenai travels to whirlpool.

“You know Hinata you should go be with your friends tonight. This will be the last you see of them,” she told Hinata. Hinata nodded her head and said goodbye to her.


What next?
